question: Will i be allowed to get braces?
question_content: Hi, im 15 years old i went to the dentist/orthodontist to get braces and they told me that my 2 top molars are missing, they told me to go to the x ray to get the film taken of my teeth, my top 2 molars are there but they are not growing yet. can i get braces while my 2 top molars isn't growing yet?

answers.answer_content: No u need to wait until they grow! :)
I still  have a molar growing which doesnt have a bracket on it and a gap where there was no adult tooth so i am pretty sure that you will be able to
